QuestData.Title: The Art of War
QuestData.Description: Lok'tar Ogar, old friend. It has been too long since last we spoke.$b$bIt is good to see that you emerged safely from the depths of Vashj'ir.$b$bI am stationed here in Grommash Hold.$b$bAll in service to the Horde are to swear allegiance to their new Warchief.$b$bYou would do well not to keep him waiting, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to General Nazgrim in Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.
